## Final examination

From all [the 15 case studies](https://worldeconomy.netlify.app/2023/06/10/case-studies/), choose one to do as follows:

- 1. Write slides (at least 10 pages) about the case study (100pts);

- 2. Write one page (double-lined, A4 paper) of your thoughts/comments about the case study (50pts).

- Email me both slides and one page thoughts/comments at shwshang@yahoo.com by the end of 6/29/2023.
